varselforgroenland.name: Warning for Greenlandic seaareas
varselforgroenland.text: There is gale warning for Aputiteeq, Kulusuk, Timmiarmiut and Nunap Isuata Kangia.

gyldighed.name: Validhoures
gyldighed.text: Forecast, valid to Monday the 4. August, 12 UTC.

oversigt.name: Synoptic situation
oversigt.text: A minor low, 1010 hPa, over Uiffaq is nearly stationary while filling. A low, 990 hPa, east of Cape Farewell, is nearly stationary. A high, 1021 hPa, over the southern and centrale Greenland, weakens gradually.

udsigtfordaneborg.name: Forecast for Daneborg
udsigtfordaneborg.text: Around south, below 8 m/s. Locally fog, otherwise good visibility.

wavesdaneborg.name: Waves Daneborg
wavesdaneborg.text: Significant wave height: 1 m. Swells: 1 m.

udsigtforkangikajik.name: Forecast for Kangikajik
udsigtforkangikajik.text: Variable, below 8 m/s, from this afternoon and evening in southeastern part gradually northeast, 3 to 8 m/s. Locally fog, otherwise good visibility.

waveskangikajik.name: Waves Kangikajik
waveskangikajik.text: Significant wave height: 1 m. Swells: 1.5 m.

udsigtforaputiteeq.name: Forecast for Aputiteeq
udsigtforaputiteeq.text: In southern part around northeast, 8 to 13 m/s, increasing to gale, 10 to 15 m/s, during of the night locally up to 20 m/s. Otherwise variable, below 6 m/s, gradually northeast, 3 to 8 m/s. Locally fog, otherwise good visibility, from this afternoon in southeastern part rain with moderate visibility.

wavesaputiteeq.name: Waves Aputiteeq
wavesaputiteeq.text: Significant wave height: 4 m. Swells: 3 m.

udsigtforkulusuk.name: Forecast for Kulusuk
udsigtforkulusuk.text: Gale from north and northeast, 8 to 15 m/s, strongest in eastern part, during the night in eastern part increasing to 15 to 20 m/s. Locally fog, otherwise mainly good visibility, from this afternoon in east- and southern part rain with moderate visibility.

waveskulusuk.name: Waves Kulusuk
waveskulusuk.text: Significant wave height: 4.5 m. Swells: 3 m.

udsigtfortimmiarmiut.name: Forecast for Timmiarmiut
udsigtfortimmiarmiut.text: Gale around north, 8 to 15 m/s, strongest in eastern part, this evening in eastern part increasing to 15 to 20 m/s. Locally fog, otherwise mainly good visibility, from this evening rain with moderate visibility from east.

wavestimmiarmiut.name: Waves Timmiarmiut
wavestimmiarmiut.text: Significant wave height: 4.5 m. Swells: 3 m.

udsigtfornunapisuatakangia.name: Forecast for Nunap Isuata Kangia
udsigtfornunapisuatakangia.text: Around north, 5 to 13 m/s, strongest in eastern part, from this night in northeastern part increasing gale, 10 to 15 m/s, Monday morning increasing to 15 to 20 m/s. Locally fog, otherwise good visibility, from late in the night rain with moderate visibility from northeast.

waveskangia.name: Waves Nunap Isuata Kangia
waveskangia.text: Significant wave height: 4.5 m. Swells: 2.5 m.

udsigtfornunapisuatakitaa.name: Forecast for Nunap Isuata Kitaa
udsigtfornunapisuatakitaa.text: Mainly between northeast and southeast, 3 to 10 m/s, Monday variable, below 8 m/s. Locally fog, otherwise mainly good visibility.

waveskitaa.name: Waves Isuata Kitaa
waveskitaa.text: Significant wave height: 1 m. Swells: 2 m.

udsigtfornunarsuit.name: Forecast for Nunarsuit
udsigtfornunarsuit.text: Variable, below 8 m/s. Locally fog and a few rain showers, otherwise good visibility.

wavesnunarsuit.name: Waves Nunarsuit
wavesnunarsuit.text: Significant wave height: 1 m. Swells: 1 m.

udsigtfornarsalik.name: Forecast for Narsalik
udsigtfornarsalik.text: Around southeast or variable, below 8 m/s. Locally fog, otherwise mainly good visibility.

wavesnarsalik.name: Waves Narsalik
wavesnarsalik.text: Significant wave height: 0.5 m. Swells: 1 m.

udsigtformeqquitsoq.name: Forecast for Meqquitsoq
udsigtformeqquitsoq.text: South and southeast, 3 to 10 m/s, however gradually in the whole water variable, below 6 m/s. Locally fog, otherwise mainly good visibility.

wavesmeqquitsoq.name: Waves Meqquitsoq
wavesmeqquitsoq.text: Significant wave height: 1.5 m. Swells: 1 m.

udsigtforattu.name: Forecast for Attu
udsigtforattu.text: Mainly around south, in eastern part 3 to 10 m/s, otherwise below 8 m/s, this evening in the whole water decreasing to variable, below 6 m/s. Locally fog, otherwise mainly good visibility.

wavesattu.name: Waves Attu
wavesattu.text: Significant wave height: 1.5 m. Swells: 1 m.

udsigtforuiffaq.name: Forecast for Uiffaq
udsigtforuiffaq.text: Variable, below 8 m/s, gradually around south, 3 to 8 m/s, in eastern part until this night locally up to 10 m/s. Locally fog, otherwise mainly good visibility.

wavesuiffaq.name: Waves Uiffaq
wavesuiffaq.text: Significant wave height: 1 m. Swells: 1 m.

udsigtforqimusseriarsuaq.name: Forecast for Qimusseriarsuaq
udsigtforqimusseriarsuaq.text: Variable, below 8 m/s. From this night in northwesternmost part around east, 5 to 10 m/s and Monday morning in the rest of the water gradually around south, 3 to 8 m/s. Locally fog, otherwise mainly good visibility, from this afternoon however locally rain with moderate to good visibility.

wavesqimusseriarsuaq.name: Waves Qimusseriarsuaq
wavesqimusseriarsuaq.text: Significant wave height: 1 m. Swells: 1 m.

udsigtforkiatak.name: Forecast for Kiatak
udsigtforkiatak.text: Mainly south and southeast, 3 to 8 m/s, from this night in southernmost part up to 10 m/s. Locally fog, otherwise mainly good visibility, from this afternoon locally rain with moderate to good visibility.

waveskiatak.name: Waves Kiatak
waveskiatak.text: Significant wave height: 1 m. Swells: 1 m.
